help.devinfo: Displays the help screen, with the list of all visible commands

game-stats.devinfo: Show vital-statistics about the current game

game-players.devinfo: Lists all players in the current game

players-dead.devinfo: Lists the players who are dead in the current game

players-alive.devinfo: Lists the players who are alive in the current game

game-initiate.devinfo: Initiate a new game for players to join

game-start.devinfo: Start a new game with the players that have joined

players-good.devinfo: DMs the user a list of all good players in the current game

players-evil.devinfo: DMs the user a list of all evil players in the current game

players-neutral.devinfo: DMs the user a list of all neutral players in the current game

players-list.devinfo: DMs the user a list of all players in the current game and their respective roles
